name: Rory For London
slogan: Rory Stewart's independent political campaign for Mayor of London
description:
Rory is standing for London Mayor to tackle the tough problems our city faces. He wants to make sure his children grow up in a city that’s still the world’s greatest. In recent months, he has gone out onto the streets, right across London, to hear people’s concerns and ideas for improving our city. Running as an independent, he’s free from party political games - able to work with everyone and take on good ideas no matter where they come from. He’s in no-one’s pocket - and answers only to ordinary Londoners.

Rory doesn’t accept our city’s problems are impossible to solve. As Mayor, he’ll roll up his sleeves and get things done - as he always has.

jobs.title: Digital Content Manager
jobs.description:
Job Description
The Digital Content Manager will play a vital role in helping our campaign teams reach their goals by communicating the campaign’s message, engaging our online audiences, mobilising supporters, and ensuring a cohesive and compelling online voice.

Responsibilities
●  Write compelling copy for all social media platforms, and source or create videos and graphics as needed in coordination with other teams.

●  Support digital team in identifying opportunities for high-impact digital engagement across platforms.

●  Manage the day-to-day execution of content for social media and email in coordination with other teams.

●  Identify ways to drive audience growth.

●  Engage with online community, respond to comments and questions, and relay community input to relevant internal stakeholders.

●  Attend and capture content at campaign events.
